snippet: David Beckham’s six years with the Los Angeles Galaxy will most likely be best remembered for the attention he brought to the team and Major League Soccer. But he also brought the team championships.
abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy defeat Houston Dynamo, 3-1, to win its second consecutive MLS championship in midfielder David Beckham's final game in the league.
lead_paragraph: David Beckham’s six years with the Los Angeles Galaxy will most likely be best remembered for the attention he brought to the team and Major League Soccer. But he also brought the team championships.

headline.seo: Galaxy Repeat as Champions in Beckham’s M.L.S. Finale
headline.main: Galaxy Repeat as Champions in Beckham’s M.L.S. Finale
headline.print_headline: Galaxy Repeat As Champions In Beckham’s M.L.S. Finale
